message:
Just like Child Sex Trafficking, Labor Trafficking happens in our own backyard. 

"Forced labor uncovered at New York waterfront wedding hall."

data.description: NEW YORK (Thomson Reuters Foundation) - U.S. authorities have accused two men in New York of recruiting immigrants from the Philippines to work for little or no pay at an historic catering hall in a…
data.title: Forced labor uncovered at New York waterfront wedding hall, authoritie
